BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

UPDATE ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_AO_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_VERIFIED=?,T.STR_VERIFIED_BY=?,T.DT_VERIFED_DATE=?,T.STR_VERIFIED_REMARKS=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

INSERT INTO ACTFS_AL_CHAL_PRE_AO_TRN(STR_DS_NO,DT_DS_DATE,STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_CHALLAN_VERIFIED,STR_VERIFIED_BY,DT_VERIFED_DATE,STR_VERIFIED_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,GNUM_ISVALID ,GNUM_SEAT_ID ,gnum_hospital_code )(select t.STR_DS_NO,t.DT_DS_DATE,t.STR_CHALLAN_NO,t.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,t.STR_CHALLAN_VERIFIED,t.STR_VERIFIED_BY,t.DT_VERIFED_DATE,t.STR_VERIFIED_REMARKS,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,t.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,t.GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,t.GNUM_ISVALID ,t.GNUM_SEAT_ID ,t.gnum_hospital_code from ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_AO_TRN t where t.STR_DS_NO=? and t.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? and t.gnum_hospital_code =?)
